item.title: A Kissing Hand For The Sandy Hook Elementary Students
item.description: A children’s book about a raccoon hesitant to start school offers a heartwarming solution for children struggling with the idea of returning to the classroom. The recent tragedy at Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Connecticut, has left many young students grappling with trauma and fear. The horrific event, where students and educators lost their lives, has created a sense of anxiety about returning to school for the spring semester. Finding a way to comfort these children and help them cope with their fears is a significant challenge.
